channel.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
channel.description:
Hi,
I have edited signlink java and have got the cache download system working which i managed by following a tutorial. I haven't jar'd it but when ever i run the client the cache downloads, after its stuck on "Connected to update server".
Can anyone help? Its connected to server but what is it stuck on? the cmd says "error_game_js5connect".
As far as i know, this means that the client has crashed but i don'tknow why. the compiler says everything is correct.
Samih.

item.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

I am looking for someone who has experienced this problem and knows how to FIX this problem . The IP is recognized, there must be wrong something with the cache but i dontknow what is wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

no you haven’t because I’ve looked it up also and its mostly from

cache packed wrong
corrupt cache
not recognizing server ip

I’m not here to argue with your problem… if you don’t want help then figure it out yourself

Read full topic
item.source: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server

item.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

dude seriously, i even looked up the error . it means the client has crashed. The IP is CORRECT stop going on about it not connecting its not saying Connecting to Update Server it is saying CONNECTED to update server.

Read full topic
item.source: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server

item.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

No it’s not connected… exit out of the server & client then go back into the files change the ips & compile again. Then re-run the server and client

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Client Stuck On Connected To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:2, topic:459522”]“error_game_js5connect”.

^I’m guessing this means that it doesn’t recognize the host server ip or the server its trying to connect to is not running.[/quote]But its stuck on CONNECTED to update server, so its connected??? the server is up.

Read full topic
